mapper.select:
select
from V_JZGJCSJXX
and xm like concat(concat('%',#{jzg.xm}),'%')
and gh like concat(concat('%',#{jzg.gh}),'%')
and ( dwh in (select unit_id from v_uicm_unit start with unit_id = #{jzg.dwh} connect by prior unit_id = belong_unit) or ejdwh in (select unit_id from v_uicm_unit start with unit_id = #{jzg.dwh} connect by prior unit_id = belong_unit) )
order by ${orderByClause}
